summary: The State Department's Bureau of Conflict and Stabilization Operations works with other federal agencies and State Department offices to help prevent conflict and stabilize conflict-affected areas abroad. We found that CSO followed some, but not all, key practices that agencies should use to measure and manage their performance. For example, CSO did not set FY 2022 targets for 8 of its 25 performance indicators, such...
title: State Department: Bureau of Conflict and Stabilization Operations Should Better Track Its Performance
